author: CNN
description: As international outcry over Israel’s conduct in Gaza grows, governments around the world are coming under pressure to sever ties with the country’s arms industry. But CNN’s Nic Robertson finds that Israel’s weapons sales are in fact still booming. #CNN #News
title: Israel arms exports boom despite global pressure

author: CNN
description: “Jimmy Kimmel Live!” will return to air on ABC on Tuesday night, the network announced in a statement. CNN's Elizabeth Wagmeister reports.
title: Jimmy Kimmel’s show set to return on Tuesday

author: CNN
description:
President Donald Trump announced Monday that the US Food and Drug Administration will be notifying physicians that the use of acetaminophen during pregnancy “can be associated with a very increased risk of autism.” “They are strongly recommending that women limit Tylenol use during pregnancy unless medically necessary,” he said. Trump said women should not use it during pregnancy “unless medically necessary” such as fever.

However, experts say autism is caused by multiple factors, and the science concerning the connection between Tylenol use during pregnancy and autism is not settled. #CNN #News
title: Trump admin links autism to acetaminophen use during pregnancy

author: CNN
description: CNN's Clare Duffy explains how TikTok's algorithm will be controlled by US-based company, Oracle, after the business deal is completed.
title: TikTok to be overseen by US companies

author: CNN
description: Tom Homan, now the president’s border czar, was recorded last year accepting a bag with $50,000 in cash by undercover FBI agents in an investigation the Trump Justice Department later closed, The New York Times reported. CNN's Evan Perez has the details.
title: Report alleges Trump border czar accepted bag of $50K in FBI sting

author: CNN
description:
"Jimmy Kimmel Live!" will return to air on ABC on Tuesday night, the network announced in a statement.
"Last Wednesday, we made the decision to suspend production on the show to avoid further inflaming a tense situation at an emotional moment for our country," a spokesperson for the Walt Disney Company, which owns ABC, said in a statement to CNN. "It is a decision we made because we felt some of the comments were ill-timed and thus insensitive. We have spent the last days having thoughtful conversations with Jimmy, and after those conversations, we reached the decision to return the show on Tuesday." #CNN #News
title: Jimmy Kimmel will be returning to air, Disney announces

author: CNN
description: US President Donald Trump said he has “settled” the conflict between Rwanda and the Democratic Republic of Congo. The ‘peace deal’ signed in Washington in June came after an armed group known as M23 – allegedly backed by Rwanda – took control of two major cities in eastern DRC, Goma and Bukavu, at the start of the year. However, many armed groups in the DRC are still fighting. In this exclusive report from rebel-held Goma, M23 says it won’t stop until it reaches the country’s capital. Rwanda denies backing the rebels. #CNN #News
title: CNN interviews rebel leader inside eastern DRC

author: CNN
description: With wind speeds of 267 kph (165 mph) Super Typhoon Ragasa has brought torrential rain and forced thousands to evacuate. The hurricane swept through the northern Philippines on Monday and is forecast to reach Hong Kong by Wednesday.
title: Super Typhoon Ragasa is the strongest on earth this year

author: CNN
description: Media lawyers and newsroom leaders are evaluating a government memo spelling out new rules that would sharply restrict reporting at the Pentagon. Several of the country’s biggest news outlets are publicly pushing back on the rules, foreshadowing a potential legal battle. “This policy operates as a prior restraint on publication, which is considered the most serious of First Amendment violations,” Seth Stern, director of advocacy at the Freedom of the Press Foundation, told CNN. #CNN #News
title: Hegseth demands that journalists sign a 'pledge' for Pentagon access

author: CNN
description: President Donald Trump increased pressure on Attorney General Pam Bondi to bring criminal charges against several political foes, calling her out by name Saturday as he noted he had reviewed statements critical over what he says is a lack of action in the investigations. Just over an hour later, however, he expressed support for the nation’s top law enforcement official. In his remarkable first post to social media Saturday, Trump essentially called on Bondi to use the power of the Justice Department more aggressively. #CNN #News
title: Trump pushes Department of Justice to go after his political opponents

author: CNN
description: Presidents Donald Trump and Volodymyr Zelensky are due to meet for a fourth time on the sidelines of the United Nations next week. Ahead of that meeting CNN's Daria Tarasova-Markina speaks to Ukrainians about their hopes for peace.
title: Hear Ukrainians on why Trump cannot end war

author: CNN
description: France is expected to recognize the state of Palestine during a summit later today in an attempt to pile pressure on Israel as it presses on with its campaign in Gaza despite international outrage. Britain, Canada, Australia and Portugal formally recognized Palestine yesterday. #CNN #News
title: More western countries recognize Palestinian state

author: CNN
description: British singer and actor Harry Styles was spotted at the Berlin Marathon on September 21, running the race in just under three hours. #CNN #News
title: Harry Styles spotted at Berlin Marathon

author: CNN
description: Tens of thousands of protesters marched in more than 80 cities across Italy on Monday in support of Palestinians. The demonstrators have called for a halt to the flow of weapons to Israel through Italian ports, as well as demanding that the Italian government join countries like the UK, Portugal, Australia and Canada that have recently recognized a Palestinian state. #CNN #news
title: Pro-Palestinian protests take place across Italy

author: CNN
description:
California Gov. Gavin Newsom signed a bill that banned most law enforcement officers, including federal immigration agents, from covering their faces while conducting official business. This ban is a direct response to recent immigration raids in Los Angeles where federal agents wore masks while making arrests. CNN's Julia Vargas Jones reports.

#cnn #news #california #immigration #gavinnewsom
title: California bans most ICE agents from wearing masks on duty

author: CNN
description: A 540-foot nuclear cooling tower was destroyed during a controlled implosion in Hartsville, Tennessee. The tower is at the abandoned Hartsville nuclear power plant. The Tennessee Valley Authority said the removal will make the site safer. #CNN #news
title: Nuclear cooling tower is demolished in Tennessee

author: CNN
description: British singer and actor Harry Styles was spotted at the Berlin Marathon on September 21, running the race in just under three hours. #CNN #News
title: Harry Styles spotted at Berlin Marathon

author: CNN
description: CNN senior data analyst Harry Enten breaks down polling numbers comparing America's trust in both the Republican and Democratic parties. #CNN #News
title: 'This economy will be the key': Enten breaks down polling on Republican vs Democratic party trust

author: CNN
description: The M23 rebel group gives CNN rare access inside Goma International Airport, in the eastern Democratic Republic of Congo. It has been closed since the group captured the city during fierce fighting in January.
title: Inside Goma's abandoned airport

author: CNN
description: Outdoor brand Arc’teryx partnered with Chinese artist Cai Guoqiang to set off a fireworks display in Shigatse city, located at the northern foot of the Himalayas. The potential environmental impact of the stunt drew hot debate and criticism across Chinese social media. #cnn #news
title: Fireworks in Himalayas spark controversy

author: CNN
description:
After testing dozens of pour-over coffee makers, we found two we love for their ease of use, quality, and ability to brew a perfect cup every time. Whether you prefer a Chemex, a Kalita dripper, or another appliance, we look at materials, filters, carafes, and even dimensions to see how they affect taste, acidity, and brewing time. Many people feel intimidated by single-serve coffee or worried about things like flow rate, temperature, heat retention, and cleaning, so we put together a simple step-by-step guide. With the right coffee beans, grinder, and a little attention to detail, brewing pour-over coffee at home is easy, user-friendly, and actually fun—whether you’re filling a mug just for yourself or serving a crowd.

Enjoy our coffee coverage? Check out CNN Underscored Explores: NYC Coffee Culture for a deep dive into the city’s best coffee spots, trends, and passionate baristas.

—----------------------

When you buy through our links, we may earn a commission.

Kalita Wave 185 P
title: Best pour-over coffee makers 2025 and how to brew the perfect cup

author: CNN
description:
US President Donald Trump headlined the emotional memorial service for the slain conservative activist Charlie Kirk in Glendale, Arizona. Trump honored Kirk's life in his remarks, including praising Kirk for wanting "the best" for his opponents, noting that's where he "disagreed" with him.

#CNN #News #CharlieKirk #Trump #Politics
title: Trump: 'I hate my opponent'

author: CNN
description: With wind speeds of 267 kph (165 mph) Super Typhoon Ragasa has brought torrential rain and forced thousands to evacuate. The hurricane swept through the northern Philippines on Monday and is forecast to reach Hong Kong by Wednesday.
title: Super Typhoon Ragasa is the strongest on earth this year

author: CNN
description: Police body camera video from the Aurora Police Department shows a family's dog, Oakley, being rescued from a house fire, but before running outside, he appears to lead the officer to his leash. No injuries were reported. #cnn #news
title: Dog leads police to his leash during rescue

author: CNN
description: Erika Kirk, the widow of conservative activist Charlie Kirk, delivered an emotional speech at his memorial service in which she said she forgives alleged shooter Tyler Robinson. #cnn #erikakirk #charliekirk
title: Kirk's widow says she forgives alleged shooter

author: CNN
description: Outdoor brand Arc’teryx partnered with Chinese artist Cai Guoqiang to set off a fireworks display in Shigatse, city, located at the northern foot of the Himalayas. The potential environmental impact of the stunt drew hot debate and criticism across Chinese social media. #cnn #news
title: Fireworks in Himalayas spark controversy

author: CNN
description: President Donald Trump’s latest order to raise the annual fee on H-1B visa applicants from $215 to $100,000 sparked panic and confusion for skilled workers, companies and foreign governments receiving the news. #cnn #news
title: Trump's H-1B visa order sets off panic

author: CNN
description: Roy Wood Jr. talks to his panel about Jimmy Kimmel’s show being taken off air. "Have I Got News For You” regularly airs Saturdays at 9pm ET/PT and streams on HBO Max the following day. #CNN #News
title: Comedians react to Jimmy Kimmel’s show being taken off air

author: CNN
description: Britain, Canada, Australia, and Portugal have all recognized Palestine as a state in seemingly coordinated announcements. Israel's war in Gaza has killed over 65,000 people, and a number of scholars and institutions are now labeling it genocide.
title: Britain, Canada, Australia, and Portugal recognize a Palestinian state

author: CNN
description: President Donald Trump delivered remarks at the memorial service for Charlie Kirk, the conservative activist fatally shot at a Utah university earlier this month. Trump, who often consulted directly with Kirk, had credited him with energizing the youth vote in 2024.  #CNN #News
title: President Trump speaks at Kirk's memorial
